content.title: Developers
content.shortDescription: Resources to guide you through our technology implementation.
content.description: Credential issuance tool that enables Trusted Authorities to issue verifiable digital identity credentials. Leverage our government-grade secure technology to streamline authentication processes and issue credentials directly to a digital identity wallet. No paperwork needed.

content.title: General documentation
content.shortDescription: Knowledge database about all GATACA's technology layer.
content.description: Your new identity wallet providing unlimited, encrypted storage of identity credentials. A master key to all digital services worldwide. National IDs. Vaccination passes. Insurance cards. Academic diplomas. All in one place.

content.title: APIs
content.shortDescription: Essential documentation to help you work with our SSI APIs.
content.description: Credential issuance tool that enables Trusted Authorities to issue verifiable digital identity credentials. Leverage our government-grade secure technology to streamline authentication processes and issue credentials directly to a digital identity wallet. No paperwork needed.
